import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HeaderColorPicker=()=>{const[headerColor,setHeaderColor]=useState('#000000');const[textColor,setTextColor]=useState('#ffffff');const[isOpen,setIsOpen]=useState(false);// Update CSS variables when colors change
useEffect(()=>{document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--header-background',headerColor);document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--header-text',textColor);// Update border color based on text color with transparency
const borderColor=textColor+'4D';// 30% opacity
document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--header-border',borderColor);},[headerColor,textColor]);// Convert hex to HSL for the hue circle
const hexToHsl=hex=>{const r=parseInt(hex.slice(1,3),16)/255;const g=parseInt(hex.slice(3,5),16)/255;const b=parseInt(hex.slice(5,7),16)/255;const max=Math.max(r,g,b);const min=Math.min(r,g,b);let h,s,l=(max+min)/2;if(max===min){h=s=0;}else{const d=max-min;s=l>0.5?d/(2-max-min):d/(max+min);switch(max){case r:h=(g-b)/d+(g<b?6:0);break;case g:h=(b-r)/d+2;break;case b:h=(r-g)/d+4;break;default:break;}h/=6;}return{h:h*360,s:s*100,l:l*100};};// Convert HSL to hex
const hslToHex=(h,s,l)=>{h/=360;s/=100;l/=100;const c=(1-Math.abs(2*l-1))*s;const x=c*(1-Math.abs(h*6%2-1));const m=l-c/2;let r=0,g=0,b=0;if(0<=h&&h<1/6){r=c;g=x;b=0;}else if(1/6<=h&&h<1/3){r=x;g=c;b=0;}else if(1/3<=h&&h<1/2){r=0;g=c;b=x;}else if(1/2<=h&&h<2/3){r=0;g=x;b=c;}else if(2/3<=h&&h<5/6){r=x;g=0;b=c;}else if(5/6<=h&&h<=1){r=c;g=0;b=x;}const rHex=Math.round((r+m)*255).toString(16).padStart(2,'0');const gHex=Math.round((g+m)*255).toString(16).padStart(2,'0');const bHex=Math.round((b+m)*255).toString(16).padStart(2,'0');return"#".concat(rHex).concat(gHex).concat(bHex);};// Handle hue circle click
const handleHueClick=e=>{const rect=e.currentTarget.getBoundingClientRect();const centerX=rect.width/2;const centerY=rect.height/2;const x=e.clientX-rect.left-centerX;const y=e.clientY-rect.top-centerY;const angle=Math.atan2(y,x)*(180/Math.PI);const hue=angle<0?angle+360:angle;const hsl=hexToHsl(headerColor);const newHex=hslToHex(hue,hsl.s,hsl.l);setHeaderColor(newHex);};// Handle saturation/lightness changes
const handleSaturationChange=e=>{const hsl=hexToHsl(headerColor);const newHex=hslToHex(hsl.h,e.target.value,hsl.l);setHeaderColor(newHex);};const handleLightnessChange=e=>{const hsl=hexToHsl(headerColor);const newHex=hslToHex(hsl.h,hsl.s,e.target.value);setHeaderColor(newHex);};// Preset colors for quick selection
const presetColors=['#000000','#1f2937','#374151','#4b5563','#6b7280','#1e40af','#1d4ed8','#2563eb','#3b82f6','#60a5fa','#059669','#10b981','#34d399','#6ee7b7','#a7f3d0','#dc2626','#ef4444','#f87171','#fca5a5','#fecaca','#7c2d12','#92400e','#a16207','#ca8a04','#eab308'];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-color-picker",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"color-picker-toggle",onClick:()=>setIsOpen(!isOpen),title:"Change Header Colors",children:"\uD83C\uDFA8 Header Colors"}),isOpen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"color-picker-panel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"color-picker-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Header Color Settings"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"close-btn",onClick:()=>setIsOpen(false),children:"\xD7"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"color-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Header Background:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"color-inputs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"color",value:headerColor,onChange:e=>setHeaderColor(e.target.value),title:"Pick header background color"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:headerColor,onChange:e=>setHeaderColor(e.target.value),placeholder:"#000000",pattern:"^#[0-9A-Fa-f]{6}$",title:"Enter hex color code"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"color-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Header color"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:textColor,onChange:e=>setTextColor(e.target.value),placeholder:"#ffffff",pattern:"^#[0-9A-Fa-f]{6}$",title:"Enter hex color Circle:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hue-circle",onClick:handleHueClick,title:"Click to change hue",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hue-circle-inner",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hue-indicator",style:{transform:"rotate(".concat(hexToHsl(headerColor).h,"deg)")}})})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"color-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Saturation: ",hexToHsl(headerColor).s.toFixed(0),"%"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"range",min:"0",max:"100",value:hexToHsl(headerColor).s,onChange:handleSaturationChange,className:"slider"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"color-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Lightness: ",hexToHsl(headerColor).l.toFixed(0),"%"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"range",min:"0",max:"100",value:hexToHsl(headerColor).l,onChange:handleLightnessChange,className:"slider"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"color-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Preset Colors:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"preset-colors",children:presetColors.map((color,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"preset-color-btn",style:{backgroundColor:color},onClick:()=>setHeaderColor(color),title:color},index))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"color-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Preview:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"color-preview",style:{backgroundColor:headerColor,color:textColor},children:"Sample Header Text"})]})]})]});};export default HeaderColorPicker;
